alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:17PM CST until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County. Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County. Fox River at Dayton affecting La Salle County. Kankakee River at Momence affecting Kankakee County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois and Newton Counties. Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. For the Fox River (Illinois)...including Algonquin Lock & Dam tailwater, Montgomery, Dayton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Fox River from Millington downstream to confluence with the Illinois River, including the Dayton gauge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Multiple structures may be threatened north of Sheridan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...Flooding is expected to continue near and upstream of the ice jam while it remains in place. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means water levels above flood stage are imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers and streams in the warned area should take immediate precautions to protect life and property. Report flooding to the National Weather Service or your local law enforcement agency only when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued bySunday afternoon at 230 PM CST.
